index.title: Community due diligence package for curious investors.
index.disclaimer: This is the unofficial due diligence package, and rumour mill, ran by enthusiastic and optimistic ECOMI investors.
index.disclaimer2: We've done all the heavy lifting for you to so that you can make your own informed decision.
index.ifInvested: If you had chosen to invest just $10,000 into the OMI token
index.wouldBe: , today your investment would be worth a staggering
index.isNotPublic: ECOMI is not a public company, any dicussion of investment is regarding the OMI token.
index.exchanges: ECOMI(OMI) is currently available to buy on the following exchanges
index.ecomiBusiness: ECOMI is a Singapore registered business, operated and supported by ORBIS Blockchain Technology Ltd
index.newZeland: ORBIS is a registered company in New Zealand.
index.ecomiAim: ECOMI’s aim is to create the world’s best platform to purchase, protect and collect premium
index.ecomiAim2: licensed digital collectibles using Distributed Ledger Technology. ECOMI consists of two elements, the
index.gap: In 2017 ECOMI identified a gap in the market for premium digital collectibles
index.gap2: , or NFTs to you and me. After identifying this gap, and predicting the rise of the technology, they started development on an end-to-end digital collectible ecosystem called VEVE.
index.theVeve: The VEVE ecosystem offers IP licensors and collectors a new type of digital asset class which is powered by blockchain technology for legitimate authenticity and scarcity. The entire ecosystem is underpinned by the deflationary OMI token and comprosies of some interesting tokenomics, which you can
index.tokenMetrics: OMI token metrics as of June 21st 2021, 8:59:18 pm
index.tldr: ECOMI is the company. VEVE is the application. OMI is the token.

teamMembers.title: Team members
teamMembers.intro: ECOMI has composed itself with an all star team with a rich and vetted reputation of successful businesses.

veveIntro.app: VEVE is an app-based marketplace available on iOS and Android for premium
veveIntro.lunched: The app was officially launched in BETA on October 2020 and regularly drops new collectibles every Thursday at 4pm GMT
veveIntro.drops: Drops frequently sell out within minutes generating millions of revenue.
veveIntro.recognized: VEVE is trusted and recognised by some of the biggest and most popular brands in the world

store.title: Store
store.browse: Users can browse collectibles from their favorite brands in premium digital format and grow their collections.
store.offers: Upon opening the VEVE app users are immediately presented with featured premium brands and collectibles, upcoming drops and powerful filtering methods. Users can easily navigate and browse digital collectibles offered, including those which are no longer available through the primary VEVE store front.

collection.title: Collection
collection.showRooms: Users can put their collection on display in their own virtual 3D showrooms. Customize, decorate, create and share.
collection.functionalities: One of the key USPs of VEVE is the rich functionality offered within the application. Users can interact with their collectibles, arrange, scale and pose within a VR showroom or using augmented reality. Users can then create sharable content to show their collection off to the world.

feed.title: Feed
feed.description: The VEVE feed is at the heart of the VEVE community. Users can utilise the feed to share content, raise discussion, like, comment and subscribe to others users.
feed.description2: Community will play a massive part in the success of the VEVE application. VEVE is fortunate enough to have one of, if not the most, enthusiastic of communities in the market both on and off the application - this website is testament to that statement. The importance of community cannot be stressed enough and VEVE is forefronting this within their application.

market.title: Market
market.subtitle: Buy, sell and trade
market.description: The market is the 'ebay' of digital collectibles and allows users to buy, sell and swap with each other.
market.description1: Users can accumulate desired NFTs through the peer 2 peer marketplace. The marketplace allows users to complete their collections or pick up collectibles that they otherwise might have missed out on.
market.description2: Additionally, the VEVE marketplace has already proven to generate active users an exponential gain on their original purchases. For example we recently saw the
market.description3: 'Donny' NFT from the Powerpuff Girls sell for $27,000
market.description4: Donny was originally priced at just $15.99 on the
market.description6: As the application continues to grow we expect collectibles to be more scarce in ratio to the user base, thus increasing their value more and more as time goes on. One could easily make the argument that purchasing the NFTs themselves is another solid investment choice for a quick turn around.

account.title: Account
account.subtitle: Management
account.description: Manage your entire collection from your phone. Browse your collectibles, complete sets, and much more.
account.description1: One of the key USPs of VEVE is the rich functionality offered within the application. Users can interact with their collectibles, arrange, scale and pose within a VR showroom or using augmented reality. Users can then create sharable content to show their collection off to the world.

veveIntro.description: Using the VEVE app collectible enthusiasts and hobbyists can purchase a multitude of collectibles from their favourite brands. Each collectible is minted within a limited number of availability and is assigned a type of rarity typically associated with collectibles.

metrics.title: $370 Billion dollar market
metrics.description: The collectibles industry is said to be worth approximately $370 billion dollars as of March 2020
metrics.description1: VEVE identified a gap in this market for premium digital collectibles backed by blockchain technology, which allows uniqueness, scarcity and accurate provenance of collectibles. The rise of NFT popularity in 2021 is thought to exponentially increase this industry worth over the coming years. VEVE have positioned themselves to be a front runner for the premium digital collectible format due to their early foresight in 2017.

rarity.title: Smarter than your average NFT
rarity.description: All of the collectibles offered on the VEVE platform undergo a strickt quality process between both the internal VEVE team and the brands and licensors themselves. Many of the collectibles used are actually derivited from the actual models used in movies, games and tv shows.
rarity.description1: The Ghostbusters Ecto-1 car is one such example of high quality control as we can note a high poly count accompanied by several details depicted on the model such as environmental texture on the windshield and arches, chromatic texturing, and various opaque materials.
rarity.ghostbuster: The Ghostbusters 1:1 Ecto-1 (Interactive) NFT dropped on the VEVE platform on July 17th 2021.
rarity.soldOut: All 4,444 editions sold out within 1 minute.

latestMediumArticles: Drag or scroll to see more Medium articles

footer.notAffiliated: site and is not in any way affiliated with ECOMI, VEVE or any of the brands or licensors mentioned. ECOMI WIKI is an open source community driven site ran not for profit.
footer.noFinancialAdvice: No content on this site should be considered financial advice and is for entertainment purposes only. Although we do attempt to verify each claim through various sources your own research is strongly advised.

valuation.title: Vault Valuation
valuation.findOut: Find out how much your VEVE vault is worth at a minimum using our valuation tool.
valuation.note1: The result should only serve as a floor expectation for your collection, the calculation will not take into account your mint numbers, provenance, or any other variables that could influence price.
valuation.note2: Comic floor prices are also currently unavailable at this time.
valuation.valuationBased: Vault valuations are based off of the current
valuation.valuationBased2: last captured. In the near future you will be able to save your collectibles to your profile and track your valuation growth in various data charts.

donate.title: Donate
donate.support: You can support the work of the ECOMI Wiki community. This community website is ran not for profit and functions solely on the passion of its investors and collectors.
donate.accept: We accept donations in the form of OMI tokens or NFTs. The QR codes displayed below belong to the contributors of the
donate.accept4: GitHub repository and are displayed to you at random, with a higher frequency of display rate to the most active monthly contributors.

tokenomics.title: What is OMI?
tokenomics.description1: cryptocurrency token that forms the underlying economy of the VEVE application. It is currently available to buy from the following exchanges:
tokenomics.mintedTokens: ECOMI minted 750 billion OMI tokens, which can immediately put uneducated investors off who are unwilling to dive into the tokenomics and the deflationary nature of the token. However, bare with us a second...
tokenomics.important1: Firstly, you'll notice the first stack of chips are red, this is because during the execution of smart contracts a user error was made which
tokenomics.important2: accidently locked up 97 billion OMI tokens for thousands of years
tokenomics.important3: , effectively taking them out of circulation. Secondly, in a recent community AMA the communications manager Rhys Skellern alluded to the possibility of an additional large burn
tokenomics.important6: Unfortunately, this is has since been revoked but we must note the open minds of the team to decrease the token circulation if they deem it necessary.
tokenomics.remaining: The remaining 653 billion tokens are divided up as follows:
tokenomics.remaining2: To be used in the in app reserve for liquidity.
tokenomics.deflationary1: The OMI token is deflationary in nature which means an inevitable higher price per token, and a better return on your investment, as the supply of the tokens become more scarce. 97 billion tokens were already burnt by error, and additional burns are constantly being triggered by in app events.
tokenomics.deflationary2: OMI tokens have been burnt since the VEVE app launched in October 2020
tokenomics.burningRate2: Burn rates do not directly effect the price of the OMI token, however a 'buy back' does occur from the exchange as a result of the burnt tokens which does effect the price.
tokenomics.burningRate3: The VEVE app has already burnt a massive
tokenomics.burningRate4: tokens since Jan 2021 with only a few drops since it was launched as a beta to the public. To date the app remains in beta, and during this beta testing phase mass marketing has not yet started, collectible drops have not been consistent, and drop dates have often been pushed back to prioritise on bugs, security, improvements and other features. Yet despite all of this user growth has exceeded expectations and burn rates remain on an upward trend.
tokenomics.tokenomics1: The tokenomics on this project have been described as both genuine brilliance, and innate madness.
tokenomics.tokenomics3: For a more complex and accurate break down of the tokenomics please check
tokenomics.tokenomics5: Although every effort has been made to make this information as accurate as possible using easy to understand methods, there may be some errors. Your own research into the official whitepaper is highly encouraged.
tokenomics.pageNotBuilt: This page is still being built...
